org.judal.storage.relational

Class AbstractRelationalOperation<R extends Record>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.judal.storage.table.AbstractTableOperation<R>
      • org.judal.storage.table.AbstractIndexableTableOperation<R>
        • org.judal.storage.relational.AbstractRelationalOperation<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Operation

    public abstract class AbstractRelationalOperation<R extends Record>
extends AbstractIndexableTableOperation<R>

    Base class for relational operation wrapper.

    Be sure to always call close() after an operation is done or else a connection leak may occur.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten
